name: @google-cloud/firestore

scripts.compile: tsc -p . && cp -r dev/protos build && cp -r dev/test/fake-certificate.json build/test/fake-certificate.json && cp dev/src/v1beta1/firestore_client_config.json build/src/v1beta1/ && cp dev/src/v1/firestore_client_config.json build/src/v1/ && cp dev/conformance/test-definition.proto build/conformance && cp dev/conformance/test-suite.binproto build/conformance
scripts.samples-test: npm link && cd samples/ && npm link ../ && npm test && cd ../
scripts.test: npm run test-only && npm run conformance
